title: The Legendary Librarian
description:
When billionaire banker J.P. Morgan needed a home for his master collection of art and rare manuscripts, an unknown woman became his trusted librarian and curator. Belle da Costa Greene was one of the most successful women of her day, but she had to keep a life-altering secret in order to succeed.

Pre-order Marie and Victoria’s novel about Belle Da Costa Greene, The Personal Librarian, from Amazon, Barnes & Noble, or an independent bookstore near you

Follow Marie Benedict on Instagram, order her novels, and learn more about her work at authormariebenedict.com 

Follow Victoria Christopher-Murray on Instagram and Facebook

To see more of Victoria’s work, head to her website: victoriachristophermurray.com 

Our Week of Women illustration is by Nina Chhita: @nina.draws.scientists

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
